definition: of something having a dusty purplish pink color, a dusty pink color
details:
adjective
- of something having a dusty purplish pink color
= example: of something having a dusty purplish pink color
= synonyms: roseate, rosaceous
noun
- a dusty pink color
= synonyms: rosiness
- pinkish table wine from red grapes whose skins were removed after fermentation began
= synonyms: blush wine
- any of many shrubs of the genus Rosa that bear roses
= synonyms: rosebush
